Package listeners

Interface ToolbarButtonListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController
public interface ToolbarButtonListener

The listener interface for receiving events that need to set certain buttons of the toolbar.

These buttons are adding/removing edges and the un-/redo buttons.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onEdgeAdded()
    An edge has been added and the add edge button needs to be reset.
    void
    onEdgeRemoved()
    An edge has been removed and the remove edge button needs to be reset.
    void
    onSetRedoButton(boolean highlight)
    The state of being able to redo steps has changed and the button needs to be set.
    void
    onSetUndoButton(boolean highlight)
    The state of being able to undo steps has changed and the button needs to be set.
    void
    resetUndoRedoButtons()
    Reset the buttons for un-/redo -> remove highlight.

  • Method Details

    • onEdgeAdded

      void onEdgeAdded()
      An edge has been added and the add edge button needs to be reset.

    • onEdgeRemoved

      void onEdgeRemoved()
      An edge has been removed and the remove edge button needs to be reset.

    • onSetRedoButton

      void onSetRedoButton(boolean highlight)
      The state of being able to redo steps has changed and the button needs to be set.
      Parameters:
      highlight - True, if button should be highlighted.

    • onSetUndoButton

      void onSetUndoButton(boolean highlight)
      The state of being able to undo steps has changed and the button needs to be set.
      Parameters:
      highlight - True, if button should be highlighted.

    • resetUndoRedoButtons

      void resetUndoRedoButtons()
      Reset the buttons for un-/redo -> remove highlight.
